SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , '' AS TEMP_QA_LIST_ID , A.QA_LIST_ID , A.QA_LIST_NM , A.USE_YN , A.ACT_STIME , A.ACT_ETIME , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT , A.LMOD_SDATE , A.LMOD_USER_ID , A.LMOD_USER_NM , A.LMOD_USER_DEPT , B.CNT
FROM PJ_QA_LIST A, ( SELECT QA_LIST_ID, COUNT(*) AS CNT FROM PJ_QA_ITEM GROUP BY QA_LIST_ID ) B
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.QA_LIST_ID = B.QA_LIST_ID(+)
ORDER BY A.ACT_STIME DESC

SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , '' AS TEMP_QA_LIST_ID , A.QA_ITEM_ID , A.QA_LIST_ID , A.QA_ITEM_NM , A.QA_ITEM_BASIS , A.QA_ITEM_TGT_VAL , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT , A.LMOD_SDATE , A.LMOD_USER_ID , A.LMOD_USER_NM , A.LMOD_USER_DEPT
FROM PJ_QA_ITEM A
WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.QA_LIST_ID = #{QA_LIST_ID}
ORDER BY A.QA_ITEM_ID
mapper.insert:
SELECT 'PJQL' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD( NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(NVL(SUBSTR(QA_LIST_ID, -6), 0) )), 0) + 1, 6, 0) FROM PJ_QA_LIST WHERE 1 = 1 AND QA_LIST_ID LIKE 'PJQL%' AND LENGTH(QA_LIST_ID) = 16
INSERT INTO PJ_QA_LIST ( QA_LIST_ID , QA_LIST_NM , USE_YN , ACT_STIME , ACT_ETIME , REG_STIME , REG_USER_ID , REG_USER_NM , REG_USER_DEPT , LMOD_SDATE , LMOD_USER_ID , LMOD_USER_NM , LMOD_USER_DEPT ) VALUES ( #{QA_LIST_ID} , #{QA_LIST_NM} , #{USE_YN} , #{ACT_STIME} , #{ACT_ETIME}
, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{LMID} , (SELECT USER_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID}) , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID})
, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{LMID} , (SELECT USER_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID}) , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID}) )

SELECT 'PJQI' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYMMDD') || LPAD( NVL(MAX(TO_NUMBER(NVL(SUBSTR(QA_ITEM_ID, -6), 0) )), 0) + 1, 6, 0) FROM PJ_QA_ITEM WHERE 1 = 1 AND QA_ITEM_ID LIKE 'PJQI%' AND LENGTH(QA_ITEM_ID) = 16
INSERT INTO PJ_QA_ITEM ( QA_ITEM_ID , QA_LIST_ID , QA_ITEM_NM , QA_ITEM_BASIS , QA_ITEM_TGT_VAL , REG_STIME , REG_USER_ID , REG_USER_NM , REG_USER_DEPT , LMOD_SDATE , LMOD_USER_ID , LMOD_USER_NM , LMOD_USER_DEPT ) VALUES ( #{QA_ITEM_ID} , #{QA_LIST_ID} , #{QA_ITEM_NM} , #{QA_ITEM_BASIS} , #{QA_ITEM_TGT_VAL}
, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{LMID} , (SELECT USER_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID}) , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID})
, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') , #{LMID} , (SELECT USER_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID}) , (SELECT DEPT_NM FROM FOMM_USER_MT WHERE USER_ID = #{LMID}) )
